BasicSizeDesc: Each pool has a storage range of 10 to 117 GB, eDTU storage capacity is 100 MB
StandardSizeDesc: Each pool has a storage range of 100 to 1,200 GB, eDTU storage capacity is 1 GB
SeniorSizeDesc: Each pool has a storage range of 63 to 750 GB, eDTU storage capacity is 0.5 GB
BasicElasticDesc: The maximum number of DTUs per database is 5, the maximum storage capacity is 2 GB
StandardElasticDesc: The maximum number of DTUs per database is 100, the maximum storage capacity is 250 GB
SeniorElasticDesc: The maximum number of DTUs per database is 1,000, the maximum storage capacity is 500 GB
